properties.entry: select doc.docId, j.judgement_id, case when documentSet = 'train' then 1 else 0 end, d.disease_id from i2b2_2008_doc doc inner join i2b2_2008_anno a on a.docId = doc.docId and a.source = 'intuitive' inner join i2b2_2008_disease d on d.disease = a.disease and d.disease_id = @export.label@ inner join i2b2_2008_judgement j on j.judgement = a.judgement inner join hotspot_instance i on i.corpus_name = 'i2b2.2008' and i.experiment = 'bag-impcuiword' and i.label = d.disease and i.instance_id = doc.docId inner join i2b2_2008_cv_best b on b.label = d.disease_id and b.experiment = i.experiment left join hotspot_zero_vector hzv on hzv.hotspot_instance_id = i.hotspot_instance_id and hzv.cutoff = b.param1 where hzv.hotspot_zero_vector_id is null
